contentfulPagePressRelease.title: Qatar Music Academy Recognizes Support of Occidental Petroleum of Qatar Ltd

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Qatar Music Academy (QMA) has thanked Occidental Petroleum of Qatar Ltd (Oxy Qatar) for its generous sponsorship of music education activities within the local community.

Oxy Qatar, the second-largest oil producer offshore the nation, has been an active partner in fulfilling QMA’s goal of providing exceptional music education programs to the community. QMA also supports QF’s commitment to community development and enhanced understanding of arts and culture in Qatar through music.

Previous donations from Oxy Qatar have funded new musical instruments, library materials and state of the art music technology for QMA’s music laboratory.

For the full story, please click here.

pageContext.title: Qatar Music Academy Recognizes Support of Occidental Petroleum of Qatar Ltd
